turns.content:
Sure, I will add frozen spinach to your freezer inventory. Here's your updated inventory list:

* Brown rice

* Bone broth (1 large container, 1 small container)
* Chickpeas (2 cans)
* Various baking-related items

Fridge:

* Marinated chicken (3 packages)

* Flour tortillas (3 large)

* Butter

Let me know if there's anything else you'd like me to help you with.
In my fridge I also have one jar it's actually half a jar of pesto sauce and 1/2 jar of Calabrian peppers in oil and also remind me to get honey.

Let me know if there's anything else you'd like me to help you with.
All right looks like we have our inventory list now let's decide on the meals for the week.

Great! Here are some meal ideas based on the inventory list you provided:

Breakfast:

* Oatmeal with frozen blueberries and honey
* Scrambled eggs with pepper jack cheese and spinach
* Toast with butter and jam

Lunch:

* Black bean and vegetable soup with brown rice
* Chickpea and spinach salad with pesto dressing
* Grilled Korean beef sirloin steak with corn tortillas

Dinner:

* Marinated chicken with asparagus and brown rice
* Vegan patties with blue corn tortillas and Calabrian peppers in oil
* Spicy chicken bites with white rice and frozen spinach

Snacks:

* Vegan chicken nuggets with green mole sauce
* Toast with butter and cinnamon sugar
* Black bean dip with tortilla chips

These are just a few ideas to get you started. You can also mix and match ingredients to create your own unique meals. Don't forget to use up any ingredients that are close to expiring first, and to make sure you have all the necessary ingredients on your grocery list.

I'm going to give you the shopping list. I am going to fill a little bit later today. Please keep track of it as well so that you can help me create quick, healthy air fryer meals based out of only the ingredients that I have available in my pantry, fridge freezer and then this shopping list..
Individually Quick Frozen Vegetables: mixed veggies (cauliflower, carrots, green beans, mixed peppers, spinach, and asparagus).
Individually Quick Frozen Fruits: mixed berries, peaches, and blueberries.
Protein: boneless skinless chicken thighs, ground beef, and pea protein powder.
Whole Grains: quinoa, brown rice, and whole wheat pasta.
Dairy: low-fat Greek yogurt and reduced-fat cheese.
Healthy Fats: avocado, almonds, and dark chocolate chips.
Herbs and Spices: garlic, ginger, cumin, paprika, dried oregano, and dried thyme.

Great, I'll keep track of your shopping list. Here's what you have so far:

* Individually Quick Frozen Vegetables: mixed veggies (cauliflower, carrots, green beans, mixed peppers, spinach, and asparagus)
* Individually Quick Frozen Fruits: mixed berries, peaches, and blueberries
* Protein: boneless skinless chicken thighs, ground beef, and pea protein powder
* Whole Grains: quinoa, brown rice, and whole wheat pasta
* Dairy: low-fat Greek yogurt and reduced-fat cheese
* Healthy Fats: avocado, almonds, and dark chocolate chips
* Herbs and Spices: garlic, ginger, cumin, paprika, dried oregano, and dried thyme

For creating quick, healthy air fryer meals, here are some ideas based on the ingredients you have available:

1. Air Fryer Chicken Thighs with Quinoa and Roasted Vegetables:
* Season the chicken thighs with garlic, ginger, cumin, and paprika.
* Cook the chicken thighs in the air fryer until crispy.
* Cook quinoa according to package instructions and set aside.
* Toss mixed veggies in olive oil, salt, and dried thyme and roast in the air fryer.
* Serve chicken thighs with quinoa and roasted veggies.
1. Air Fryer Ground Beef and Veggie Stir-Fry:
* Cook ground beef in the air fryer until browned.
* Add mixed veggies and cook until tender.
* Season with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.
* Serve with brown rice.
1. Air Fryer Peach and Berry Crisp:
* Mix frozen peaches and berries in a bowl and top with a mixture of oats, almonds, and dark chocolate chips.
* Cook in the air fryer until bubbly and crisp.

I hope these ideas help you create quick and healthy meals using your air fryer and the ingredients you have available. Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
Perfect please add to my pantry, one box of of healthy cavatappi another can of refried beans, a package of cappellini, and a package of protein pasta.
